property.name: Theme
property.caption: JQuery UI Theme
property.help: The jQuery UI theme used to style the tabs

property.name: Fx
property.caption: Fx Type
property.help: The fx used for tab page transitions

property.name: FxSpeed
property.caption: Fx Speed
property.help: The fx string used for tab page transitions

property.name: Rotate
property.caption: Rotate tabs
property.help: Check to make the tabs rotate

property.name: RotateTime
property.caption: Rotate time (milliseconds)
property.help: The time in milliseconds between each tab rotation

property.name: RotateContinue
property.caption: Continue Rotate after select
property.help: Check to make the tabs continue to rotate after a tab is selected
